headline: North America $100+ Bn Pharmaceutical Packaging Markets, 2025-2033 by Material, Product, Countries and Company Analysis
summary: The North America Pharmaceutical Packaging Market is projected to grow from US$ 53.91 billion in 2024 to US$ 100.03 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 7.11% from 2025-2033. Key drivers include increased pharmaceutical production, rising demand for biologics and specialty drugs, and growth of e-pharmacies. Regulatory compliance and counterfeiting concerns boost the market for advanced packaging solutions like smart packaging and anti-counterfeit features. Major players such as Amcor and WestRock fue

headline: $92.7 Bn Metal Cans Market - Global Forecasts from 2025 to 2030: Opportunities Driven by Eco-friendly Packaging Demand, Particularly Aluminum, Due to High Recyclability and Energy Efficiency
summary: The metal cans market presents opportunities driven by eco-friendly packaging demand, particularly aluminum, due to high recyclability and energy efficiency. Growth is bolstered by rising canned beverage consumption, technological innovations like digital printing, and urbanization trends, while addressing environmental concerns.
